item.description:
CHECK BACK closer to the time for actual dates....
How to Tell a Kick Butt 5 minute story.

Come and enjoy a 1.5 hour workshop on finding a story from your life experience with coaching and pointers on performance. Storytelling is a whole performance art unto itself.

In this workshop you will begin to learn how storytelling differs from theater, stand up and twisting balloon animals and how to mine your life experience to craft a story.

Followed by an open mic opportunity to tell your story to an audience. 5 minute stories on a theme.

Limited to 16 and minimum of 6 to run. A series of workshops that will be taught by two professional massmouth storytellers, who will feature with a ten minute segment at the open mic

2nd Mondays from MAY 10th - SEPT 13th when the Story Slam 2010-2011 season opens
The cost is $20 for the workshop and you must buy something ($5 minimum) at the venue.

Open mic starts at 8PM and is free with a $5 minimum at the venue
item.how_to_find_us: We are in the Hardwood Room...
